m.marble-sense: חנן:002001002020:Merciful:to be kindly disposed;to be generous;to be merciful;to be gracious;to pity
רגז:002001001064:Unsteady:to tremble;to shake;to quake;to be disturbed;to be perturbed;to be excited;to flutter
אמר:002004001009008:Speak:to say;to speak;to tell;to command;to think;to call
דמם:002004001009004:Non-Speak:to be silent;to keep silent;to remain silent;to be silenced
אמר:002004001009008:Speak:to say;to speak;to tell;to command;to think;to call
